page.title: 08HOUSING ESTATES IN ROYSTON
page.content: Here are some personal views from children about their houses:_ {JOANNE:}My house is a detached house and it is big and lovely.{KELLY:}I think the houses are pretty because of the flowers.{DASA:}My home is on a hill and it is a semi-detatched house. {SUSANNAH}There are 9 rooms in my house {STUART:}Our dining room and living room are together.{LORINDA:}We have a separate dining room and living room. {ANGELA:}We have a kitchen and dining room together{GREG:}We have 3 bedrooms one for me,one for my brother and one for my mum and dad.{DARREN:}We have four bedrooms and the baby has the smallest and mum and dad have the biggest. {KEITH'S}house has a garage at the back,and{CHRISTOPHER'S}garage is at the side of their house.{DANNY'S garage is a block around the corner. {COLIN'S}house has a porch.
